text: The 1967 European Karate Championships, the 2nd edition, was held in the sports complex of Crystal Palace in London, England, from May 2 to 4, 1967. ==Medalists== {| |- |rowspan=2|Ippon |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Team |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- |} ==Medal table== ==References== ==External links== *Karate Records - European Championship 1967 1967 Category:International sports competitions in London European Karate Championships European championships in 1967 European Karate Championships Category:Karate competitions in the United Kingdom
title: 1967 European Karate Championships
